meanings: be placed in an extreme situation
be placed in an extreme situation

vlive.korean: 이게 진짜 극한 빡셈이에요 뭐라고 해야 되지? This is the most extreme... How do you say it? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 룸메즈의 간식타임!
vlive.english: This is the most extreme... How do you say it?

vlive.korean: '극한직업' [정정] - 그거 경찰들이 운영해 - 그래요? "Extreme Job." [Correcting] - That restaurant is run by police officers. - Really? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
vlive.english: "Extreme Job." [Correcting] - That restaurant is run by police officers. - Really?

vlive.korean: 극한 직업 아니에요 이 정도면 선생님? Isn't being a teacher an extreme job at this rate? 듣기 View video AB6IX : FM04.01📻🐦빵웅동디
vlive.english: Isn't being a teacher an extreme job at this rate?

vlive.korean: [빵이와 극한견주 하빵의 험난한 브이앱] 야야야! 아니야! 잠깐만! [Extreme job... Being the owner of Bbang] Hey! No. Come on! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Apink] 상큼발랄 인간비타민 하빵이의 큐티를 픽♡업♡ 👏👏 (HAYOUNG talking about animation&snack of memory)
vlive.english: [Extreme job... Being the owner of Bbang] Hey! No. Come on!

vlive.korean: '극한 직업'? but "Extreme Job"? 듣기 View video BTOB : 심심..I’m bored..

examples.korean: TV pictures showed the arctic conditions. 발음듣기 TV 장면들은 극한의 환경을 보여주고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: TV pictures showed the arctic conditions. 발음

examples.korean: He broke through the pain barrier at 25 kilometres and went on to win his first marathon. 발음듣기 그는 25킬로미터 지점에서 고통의 극한점을 통과한 뒤 계속 달려 마라톤 첫 우승을 이뤄 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He broke through the pain barrier at 25 kilometres and went on to win his first marathon. 발음

examples.korean: If suffer we must, let's suffer on the heights. (Saadi) 발음듣기 시련을 겪어야만 한다면 차라리 극한의 시련을 겪자. (사디, 인내명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If suffer we must, let's suffer on the heights. (Saadi) 발음

examples.korean: The OE engine failed due to extreme cold. 발음듣기 극한의 추위로 순정 엔진이 고장 났다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The OE engine failed due to extreme cold. 발음

examples.korean: Adrenalists like extreme sports. 발음듣기 아드레날린 중독자들은 극한 스포츠를 좋아한다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
